verbs.description: Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's personal lawyer , [V: is] searching for a new legal team to represent him in an FBI investigation of his business dealings .
[ARG0: Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's personal lawyer ,] is [V: searching] [ARG1: for a new legal team to represent him in an FBI investigation of his business dealings] .
